text:
Michelle Rossignol, OC, CQ (4 February 1940 – 18 May 2020) was a Canadian movie actress. She appeared in 15 movies, beginning in 1956. She was made an Officer of the Order of Canada in 1991 and a Knight of the National Order of Quebec in 2001. Her best known roles were in "Once Upon a Time in the East", "Beyond Forty" and "You".
Rossignol died on 18 May 2020, aged 80.
